nl.fameit.tide

Class ComplexFloat

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.fameit.tide.ComplexFloat

  • public class ComplexFloat
extends java.lang.Object
    Complex number with floats for the re (real) and im (imaginary) parts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float im
      Imaginary part of the complex number
      float re
      Real part of the complex number
